title: shashank2122/Local-Voice
summary: A real-time, offline voice assistant for Linux and Raspberry Pi. Uses local LLMs (via Ollama), speech-to-text (Vosk), and text-to-speech (Piper) for fast, wake-free voice interaction. No cloud. No APIs. Just Python, a mic, and your voice.

title: MoriTranslates/rpgmaker-translator
summary: Translate RPG Maker MV/MZ games from Japanese to English using a local LLM (Ollama). No cloud API needed — runs entirely on your machine.

title: cryptokid980/homelab-2-prod-ai-golden-path
summary: This is a golden path (opinionated shortcut) to explore AI from local homelab to PROD using OSS for technological independence and local LLM for privacy. We explore concepts like AI agents, RAG and LLM using OSS technologies like Linux, Opentofu, microk8s, DAPR, Ollama, TimescaleDB & pgai Vectorizer, Flask and Python.

title: eSlider/go-ollama
summary: Go client for Ollama and Open WebUI — authenticated streaming API, real-time token callbacks, code block extraction

title: Bazinga23451/semantic-qa-gen
summary: A Python library for generating high-quality question-answer pairs from PDF, DOCX, MD, and TXT files

title: namel3ss-Ai/namel3ss
summary: English-first, AI-native programming language built from the ground up to support AI.

title: sudoleg/YouTubeGPT
summary: YouTubeGPT is an LLM-based web-app that can be run locally and allows you to summarize and chat (Q&A) with YouTube videos.

title: BluBluBlaBla/vidsummize
summary: Vidsummize

title: paberr/ownscribe
summary: Local-first meeting transcription and summarization CLI

title: SirUli/homeassistant-ollama-addon
summary: Provides an Home Assistant addon for Ollama

title: syklon99/ai-chatbot-svelte
summary: A full-featured, hackable SvelteKit AI chatbot built by Vercel

title: Uragon005/ai-chatbot-svelte
summary: A full-featured, hackable SvelteKit AI chatbot built by Vercel

title: mrdushidush/agent-battle-command-center
summary: Cost-optimized AI agent orchestration with RTS nostalgia UI. Run 88% of coding tasks FREE on Ollama, with Claude handling the rest.

title: nwtgck/naidan
summary: A privacy-focused web UI for LLMs (OpenAI-compatible APIs and Ollama) designed to run directly from a portable directory on your filesystem.

title: stackitcloud/rag-template
summary: Template for AI chatbots & document management using Retrieval-Augmented Generation with vector search and FastAPI.

title: clidey/whodb
summary: A lightweight next-gen data explorer - Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, MariaDB, Elastic Search, and Clickhouse with Chat interface

title: brittytino/cyber-sop-assistant
summary: A fully local Cybercrime SOP assistant for India, combining a FastAPI backend, React frontend, and Ollama-powered RAG system to provide guidance, resources, and reporting workflows without cloud dependencies.

title: RicherTunes/Brainarr
summary: Local AI Music Discovery for Lidarr - Brainarr is a privacy-focused AI-powered import list plugin for Lidarr that generates intelligent music recommendations using local AI models. It exclusively supports local providers (Ollama, LM Studio) to ensure your music preferences never leave your network.

title: BryanBradfo/humanAI
summary: ❤️‍🩹 RAG chatbot using streamlit to answer questions about help documents & solidarity ✊

title: bug-ops/zeph
summary: Production-ready AI agent runtime in Rust — hybrid inference across Ollama, Claude, OpenAI & HuggingFace with multi-model orchestration, skill-based tool use with self-learning, RAG via Qdrant, MCP integration, A2A protocol. CLI + Telegram.
